author: Justine Pattison
method: Divide the yoghurt between two small bowls. Scatter the banana on top. Sprinkle with seeds or nuts and serve.
ingredients: 340g/12oz fat-free natural Greek-style yoghurt,  1 banana, peeled and sliced,  15g/Â½oz mixed seeds (pumpkin, sesame and sunflower) (or use toasted flaked almonds)
